description: Fatma Coskun came from a small village amongst the mountains of Corun. However, financial hardships drove her and her husband to Australia to start a new life. Despite a major setback at the beginning of their journey, Fatma and her family consider themselves very fortunate to have settled in Australia.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002010; Stories from the Turkish community : Digital Storytelling project; Active; 2007
